text: If you’re after a reasonably-priced fitness tracker that doesn’t compromise on specs and features, then you might want to check out this offer for the Fitbit Charge 6. The Fitbit Charge 6 is the current iteration of Fitbit’s premium fitness tracker line, and this deal brings down its price with as much as 25% off. Don’t let the small size fool you – the Fitbit Charge 6 comes with compatibility for both Android and iOS devices via the Fitbit app, and is able to keep an eye on metrics such as heart rate, sleep quality, ECG and irregular Heart Rhythm Notifications, Oxygen saturation (SpO2) Monitoring, in addition to more than 40 different exercise modes.
